title: #75 Barbell Training with Mark Rippetoe Part 1
description: This week I talk to strength training expert and author Mark Rippetoe about barbell training. We discuss why a man should be strong, the benefits of barbell training over machines, old-time strongmen, the importance of form in barbell training, the main lifts every man should be doing and much, much more. In next week's episode I field questions to Mark that AoM readers had for him.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
